website_summaries.verdict: Copper-infused mats are supposed to conduct heat better for better results. Worth a try at this price.
pros: The mats are woven with copper threads and covered with a nonstick coating
The fabric is thinner than most, yet strong and durable
Capable of handling up to 500 degrees
cons: Owners say best results are with lower temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Nice woven material that is both thin and very strong
customer_reviews.text: Nice woven material that is both thin and very strong. Wont rip. Gifted to my son-in-law who is an avid 'griller'. He has a large gas grill and 2 of these fit nicely, side by side. He likes these very much. Conducts heat well. Prevents food from falling thru the grid. An easy way to grill vegetables without needing additional foil pan. Makes after-grilling clean up a lot quicker. Of course, you wont get the traditional grill marks on your meats, but if that is not a deal breaker, these are nifty grilling sheets.
customer_reviews.author: NonnieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful new reusable tool to replace parchment paper
customer_reviews.text: I bought three packs of 3 packs, and use them almost every day. Usually I use them to line my baking sheets for baking, roasting and broiling vegetables, grains, sweets, and even fruit leather. They are easy to clean, and I have used the dishwasher sometimes, but usually wash them by hand. They dry quickly, and roll up easily for storage in the original packaging. It was easy to use kitchen scissors to cut two of the sheets to fit exactly to a smaller pan. Very highly recommended! What a great way to limit your use of foil and parchment paper.
customer_reviews.author: Cbee

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Copper Grill Mats
customer_reviews.text: I have been using copper grill mats now for over 3 years. I was pleased to find these mats on Amazon. They are of high quality and durability. The price from Amazon is much lower than other brands. I always prepare the mats before grilling with a canola oil spray to keep food from sticking to the mats. They work great! Food cooks evenly, the mats prevent grease or food from dripping or falling inside of my grill (which means no flare-ups), and the mats are easy to remove after cooling for cleaning. I can't recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: MS Pitt

customer_reviews.title: One of my favourite BBQ gadgets!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really handy product! I was using it in my last BBQ event with friends and family and it helped reduce the flames I usually get from the fat dripping. I liked the grill-marks on the steaks and everybody complimented me about the great taste. Cleaning was as easy as 1-2-3 as this is a real non-stick and no residue was left on the mat. I also liked the fact that you get more than a single sheet, as I was able to cover the entire lower grate of my weber (I have a big grill for a big family). Very well done (pun intended) and a strong 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: A Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like to cook vegetables on the grill and have had ...
customer_reviews.text: We like to cook vegetables on the grill and have had to use a pan that is very hard to clean. We decided to try these sheets and have grilled chicken and vegetables and steaks and corn on them. The food cooks well and doesn't stick and the mats cool relatively quickly for cleaning. They clean with relative ease. (I can't speak to putting them in a dishwasher as we don't have one, other than me!) Excellent purchase at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Davison

customer_reviews.title: Grilling done right!
customer_reviews.text: Used the mats for the first time yesterday and am I glad I bought these! My new, expensive grill remained clean, the steaks tasted great and the veggies cooked to perfection. They didn't hamper the effect of my smoker box, the Mesquite chips added the right amount of flavor to everything. Clean-up was pretty straight forward, let the mats cool down, scrub them with scrubbing sponge, a little soap and hot water and 90% of the mat was like new. Can't wait for next weekend...yum.
customer_reviews.author: Hedlite

customer_reviews.title: Great reuse mats for use in the oven
customer_reviews.text: Great mats for oven. I bought this to use in oven instead of foil and this was a great buy. Fits my pan perfectly, easy to wash and dry quickly. Doesn't burn while I the oven. I use it in 400 f while making my kids corn dogs and fish sticks and it doesn't burn or Change color. Easy to clean once done use. Great to reuse. I feel this is healthier than using a foil. And it comes with a great box to hold until needed
customer_reviews.author: Rama

customer_reviews.title: No longer a skeptic
customer_reviews.text: I used the copper mat for grilling tri-tip and sausage last night. This is after I spent a lot of time cleaning the grill and hoped to keep it clean. The mat worked great! Noticing the mat was supposed to be safe up to 500 degrees, I checked the grill surface temperature and found it going as high as 700 degrees and found no degradation of the mat, although I reduced the heat just to be safe. Dinner turned out great, the grill is still clean, and the mat cleaned up effortlessly. I'm surprised it worked as well as advertised, but pleased that it did.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean with use of high temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I cut the size I needed, which is great feature, and used it to grill a steak. I preheated the grill to 600 degrees. It worked well for cooking, and the flavor was great. The thickness/weight makes it easier to manipulate than aluminum foil. I followed the cleaning instructions, but ended up scrubbing without getting all the blackened areas clean. I have not reused yet, so I don't know what will happen to the charred areas next use.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: I thought I'd split these into 3 gifts...I like them too much to do that now.
customer_reviews.text: Used them with sticky bbq sauce on ribs last night that would have fallen through the grate otherwise last night...perfect. I could keep basting with that yummy sauce onto them because it didn't fall through and create flare ups. These weren't quite big enough for my large grill if used horizontally, but I laid two side by side with a slight overlap, and that worked well. I tossed them into my sink with some hot soapy water and they cleaned up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sheets do a great job of keeping my grill clean, especially when cooking chicken or other foods that tend to stick to the cooking grates. Clean-up is a breeze, as these sheets are non-stick and can be cleaned with hot water, soap and a little scrubbing. Have already used one about 10 times and it still looks good. The grill marks are not as pronounced when using the sheets, so I sometimes set the food directly on the grates near the end of the cooking cycle for an authentic look. Overall for the price and ease of clean-up, I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F.

customer_reviews.title: I give it a thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: These mats work pretty well. I grill two to three times a week but, I hate cleaning the grill. After getting a new grill for Christmas, I've used one of these mats every time I fired it up and, the only sign of use is the slight discoloration from the heat. The one mat that I've used is getting harder to clean and, not looking so new anymore but, I've used that one mat at least a dozen times and, I bet I can get another dozen uses before I toss it and start on the next one. If you grill once or twice a month, this set should give you years of use and, a cleaner grill too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by how good they work
customer_reviews.text: Must admit I was skeptical at first. They looked flimsy and felt like a big plastic sheet. Tonight, I made some burgers and chicken breasts. Food cooked quickly, and chicken browned nicely. When the mat cooled ----and caution: WAIT until they are cool! --- I put them into the sink with hot soapy water. Everything cleaned right up. The only challenge I had was turning over the food since the mat was slippery. Other than that, minor issue. I am a little afraid to use them in the over unless they are on a baking sheet to keep from sliding. Yes, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: kohala coast gal

customer_reviews.title: Great mats!
customer_reviews.text: I received these grill mats just in time for a memorial day bbq. They worked out great! I cooked hamburgers, hot dogs, and chicken wings on them. The wings came out perfectly juicy and delicious. The hot dogs had classic sear marks on them and tasted great. The hamburgers did not have sear marks on them, but tasted amazing nonetheless. I would recommend this product for anyone who does not want to deal with the mess of having all the grease from the meat drop down into the grill and for anyone who does not want to deal with the hassle of scraping food off the grill grates. I am hoping these mats will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tan

customer_reviews.title: Wow, greatest invention since beer
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY way to barbecue! Put a sheet on the grill and put a steak in the center of the sheet. The steak cooks just the same as cooking on the grill itself. The difference is that the juices remain right around the steak and are not lost through the grill into the burner/coals which means that you can save the juice served on the steak or use the juice for something else. What a great idea. I even gave some to my son and to my neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly and doesn’t stick.
customer_reviews.text: A friend’s posted a video on Facebook using these to grill wings. I had to have them. I got them in two days, and used them that night. These are the best thing since sliced bread! Grilled veggies one one side and chicken on the other side. Nothing dried out. Everything cooked evenly and food doesn’t stick. This is so much better than using a grilling basket and it doesn’t take up space. I put one in my motorhome and kept two in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Treese

customer_reviews.title: Grilled food looks beautiful and tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the copper matts once so far but I was extremely impressed. We cooked salmon steaks on the grill. My husband was dubious so he put his steak directly on the grill. Halfway through the cooking time. He moved his mangled steak to the copper matt where mine was getting beautifully cooked complete with grill marks. The matt did not clean up completely but I do not think it will affect its performance. I am looking forward to making grilled vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Seitz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great - it keeps your grill clean, still allows grill marks and keeps small pieces of food from falling thru the grates. Wife is looking forward to using it in oven when frozen pizza is supposed to be placed directly on the oven rack.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great on steak and leaves the grill marks. I have grilled marinated steak and chicken and and the mats are so tight that the sauce stayed on top of the mats. If you don't understand the importance of that last line imagine having ready made au jus sauce just sitting there on the grill mat waiting to slathered on your dinner. Can be trimmed with scissors and not hard to wash. And they leave your grill clean. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: best invention since the invention of the barbecue pit
customer_reviews.text: best invention since the invention of the barbecue pit. Like so much that I purchased a 2nd set for work. Distributes heat evenly across all grill, stops grease dropping below the mats and saves the grill plates, the grill heat deflectors, the grill burners and keeps the bottom of the grill from rusting out. I wish I'd known about these years ago. Great invention!!!
customer_reviews.author: Santa Claus

customer_reviews.title: Great mats, attractively priced, with a proactive seller
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually used these yet, but they appear identical to a mat I used for over a year. They are extremely easy to use (toss copper mat on the grill, but food on the mat), and the seller reached out in advance to make sure I knew how to contact them with any issues, and provide some tips on their use.
customer_reviews.author: WoodsChuck

customer_reviews.title: Not performing as expected
customer_reviews.text: These did not perform to my expectations, I used them on my grill and one caught fire plus all the grease from the food poured down into the grill creating a total mess. I gave 2 stars for the product but I give 5 stars for the feedback from the seller and the willingness to make a not so good product to me a customer friendly experience. I would definitely purchase from this seller again just not the mats because they were not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than cleaning the grill or baking sheet and reusable. I noticed there are permanent grill marks but does not affect the clean ability of the product. And saves on having to buy tinfoil! It says you can cut them to whatever size but I haven’t. It will crease if you fold them. It’s like a thick fabric with some non stick coating built in.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Armstead

customer_reviews.title: The grill taste is not there
customer_reviews.text: We used it on the grill, and it's truly nonstick! Our burgers were sliding right across. It is a super easy to clean also. The downside we saw was that the burgers didn't have the char and flavor we've grown accustomed to when using the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Nice tight weave
customer_reviews.text: One of my complaints with some mats is that the weave is too open. These with their tighter weave make grilling veggies along with you meat easier. Haven't tried them in the oven yet but I'm sure they will do fine
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Grill Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I really like these because I don't have to clean the grill grates after each cooking. The mats are easy to clean, just a little warm water and soap. I use them for everything cooked on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Orwig

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! No more messing with foil. We've grilled all kinds of meats and veggies on these copper mats and everything has turned out great. Clean up is easy, just be sure to clean them after you use them. A little bit of Dawn dish soap gets everything right off. These make great gifts for the griller in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Macy Blayney

customer_reviews.title: only good to 500
customer_reviews.text: If you cook on a grill with high heat to get that real grilled tasted on steaks don't wast your time with this. only good to 500.deg. not good for steaks,maybe OK for burgers, chicken etc. threw mine in the trash after the first use. dealer offered full refund. said they were working on new mats that would go past 500Deg
customer_reviews.author: High volume buyer

customer_reviews.title: They’re OK
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these a couple of times. We like to marinate our meats so without anywhere for it to go, the marinade ends up charring on the mat. It’s not terribly difficult to clean, but it’s not easy either. I thought I would use these more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Smith

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! now when i am doing BBQ my vegetables are not falling between the BBQ net and the taste is even BETTER!!! same thing when i using those copper grill mat for meat YOU HAVE TO TRY IT TO UNDERSTAND !!
customer_reviews.author: Nave Edelshtein

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Tilapia on the grill- hot summer nights and no hot kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Two of these cover my gas grill grate. I took care to keep the temp below 500. I cooked tilapia fillets on one and marinated peppers and zucchini on the other. Nothing stuck and cleanup was a breeze- once cooled wash with a bit of Dawn. Wow. I have never had fish cook so easy on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, "saves Scrubbing"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. It saves on cleanup when you roast things with oil or fat in the oven. You just line your pan with the copper sheet. Clean up is a " breeze" . Absolutely no scrubbing ! We were so happy with the product, I bought more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: June McCann

customer_reviews.title: If you want a great copper Matt, these are for you!
customer_reviews.text: These matts are awesome! Our fish and vegetables came out perfectly. No need to worry about anything falling in the grill. To say the clean up of them is easy is a understatement. A quick dip in the sink and everything slid off of them. We camp ever weekend so I am pleased to find matts that store easily, clean easily, and cook food evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great product, super easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Helps keep the grill clean. Some fats, marinades, juices, etc. still spill over but the grates are mainly clean. The mats maintain high heat and you still get the grill marks on the food. Further, the mats clean up without much effort at all. Love, love, love these things!
customer_reviews.author: fozzyco

customer_reviews.title: Great way to cook on the grill.
customer_reviews.text: Cooked 2 steaks and 15 shrimps on 2 copper sheets on my grill with great results. The steaks were cooked medium rare with no problems. The shrimps were cooked with a mayonnaise sauce and they turned out perfect. Clean up was no problem, put the sheets in the dishwasher and they came out perfectly clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick K. Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: useful BBQ item
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Does not change flavor. Meats cook more moist. Gets some burnt grill marks on the back that does not come off. In general, it is good
customer_reviews.author: Shahnaz Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Summer grilling
customer_reviews.text: With the weather changing to nice warm days. I'm looking forward to using these on my grill outside. I know they work great on my cookies. I'm sure they'll be great for grill veggies and meats too.
customer_reviews.author: geri 74

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how easily these wipe clean. I line my copper airfry basket trays with them. You can easily cut to size. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great liner for the grill. Great for meats that tend to fall apart. Helps to keep flam- ups that burn the meat. Good addition to the grill
customer_reviews.author: Hershal D. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: They are more difficult to clean than the grill gratings ...
customer_reviews.text: They are more difficult to clean than the grill gratings, and the edges tend to burn through which creates holes along the edge. The one thing they do is to keep the grease/oil from dripping down into the burner area.
customer_reviews.author: SPYDERBILLY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cooking tools I have used in a long time. Super easy to use and even easier to clean. The best part is if needed you can cut it down to size to fit on cooking sheets as well as use them in a toaster oven. This would be a perfect gift for anyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Clem

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the grill mat on the grill yet but I'm pleased with it in the oven. My only complaint is that it's quite small compares to the ones I usually use in the oven. I'm sure that's a great grill size though! They come 3 in a pack and are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Does not leave grill marks on meat...vegetables it does. The burger grease pool on the mat. Not quite what it was touted to be.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnne M.

customer_reviews.title: Grill cleaning just became easier.
customer_reviews.text: Diffuses heat without taking away the grilling taste experience. If we use sauces and the buildup and burn is too much we just cut that out and salvage the rest. SO MUCH better than spending hours soaking and scrubbing grill grates. Great for lining the bottom of an electric over to catch bubble overs Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Life and grill saver
customer_reviews.text: They worked wonderfully and turned my 1hr cleanup into 10-15 minutes worth of cleanup, saved me from some elbow grease scrubbing. These are great christmas presents for the grilling fans , that hate scrubbing there grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jd Hale

customer_reviews.title: Easy product to use
customer_reviews.text: It's great tool to have when you cook on the outdoor grill, easier because you don't have to cover with aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Tried the mat on the grill last night with fish — it worked well and the fish didn’t stick! First time that has ever happened as my fish always sticks regardless the preparation of the the fish, or oiling the fish basket, etc. The cleanup was very easy. I intend to cook fish again tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried these yet but they are much thicker and durable that I thought. Looks like I will be able to re-use.
customer_reviews.author: Shoozzi

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut to size and easy to clean. I bought to keep toaster oven bottom tray clean. I am still using first sheet cut and gave a friend some as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: averageanne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product . Does what it advertise . Great for my vegan wife that doesn’t want vegetables to touch the meat covered grill .
customer_reviews.author: Raz Peress

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solution to make some small things on the grill, like tofu cubes or small cut of veggies that could easy fall from the skew. And i found my solution! The store box is really convenient to store the mats, the fact that its dishwasher safe was a must for me. Really enjoy it :)
customer_reviews.author: A.B.C

customer_reviews.title: Great mats! Never burn your steaks!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean while still hot. I scrape them and wipe them off, then wash them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my food Kosher
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solution for the building's grill, so I could keep my food kosher. And it certainly meets my expectations! The surface absorbs the heat so that the meat is well roasted and there is no difference in taste
customer_reviews.author: Nissan

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilling so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, easy to use. You can even make french fries on the grill with this!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Alwine

customer_reviews.title: Good to use for portable or camping site grills
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using the product and have had them for over a year. They are difficult to clean and do not withstand the heat very well, however they are still in-tacked and great to take to use with portable grill, or camping site grills.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: easy cooking
customer_reviews.text: Got it fast .My wife and I had heard a lot about these mats The wife was thrilled . These copper mats makes cooking on the grill and clean up easier Thanks
customer_reviews.author: G. McManus

customer_reviews.title: perfect product for this usage
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my grill, but planning to use it when I am using public BBQs to keep my meat clean from grease and mass of previous users. perfect product for this usage.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It is definitely non-stick as advertised, the meats came off with absolutely no issues and the cleanup was simple. I did have an issue with juices pooling around the meats however they cooked off after a while.
customer_reviews.author: NA in L.A.

customer_reviews.title: The best way to grill flawlessly without burning your food and ...
customer_reviews.text: These mats can be used on your barbecue and in your oven. The best way to grill flawlessly without burning your food and dirtying your barbecue and still have a beautiful grill marks on your meat !! They are good for a reuse and come in a beautiful solid box to store them.
customer_reviews.author: ofir

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work Good. Non stick and just throw them in the dishwasher. Winner in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Dynomite Adventures

customer_reviews.title: BBQing made easy
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT find...easy cleanup p, great price, and effective
customer_reviews.author: Fred L Casmir

customer_reviews.title: Burned up!
customer_reviews.text: First time used one of them burned up...Had to throw water on the grill, serious flames!
customer_reviews.author: DG Home account

customer_reviews.title: I love these grill matts
customer_reviews.text: I love these grill matts! I was a little bit skeptical if I would like them as I love grill marks and the smoke flavor of grilling. These mats really delivered. The chicken was great and my new grill still looks like a new grill! Plus the price is awesome, I would highly suggest you give them a try. I am sure glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: chuckjung

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a clean freak, I thought this was a great idea, being able to keep the grill clean, but never thought the product through. Maybe for baking it would be fine, but think about this, when your grilling like, hamburgers, or anything greasy, the grease from cooking burns off or drops to the bottom of the grill. Well, with the Copper Grill Mats, the grease lays on the mats and therefore you are cooking in grease. I will not use them again for grilling but maybe in the oven for baking. The actual sheets seem fine but unless your cooking chopped vegies on your grill, they are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Candoitoo

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: I have used the mats as a lining on cookie sheet to bake some Holiday cookies. It is just as easy to use with no muss fuss or bother.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Purchased sets for my daughters. I have grilled beef, pork and chicken and my grill is very clean. You even see grill marks as though you cooked without the mat. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: we

customer_reviews.title: Clean grill.great tasting food
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I’d like it but I love it. Keeps the grill clean and still imparts flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Woodington

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at the picnic
customer_reviews.text: Used to cook about 40 burgers and hot dogs at a picnic in a public park. Covered dirty grill grates just fine and did not break down under heat. Cleaned up fairly quickly but the copper color shows some marks.
customer_reviews.author: Freestyle

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: rhard to clean... after a few uses needed to be disposed of
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes try these!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! Love them for fish on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Nealeo1970

customer_reviews.title: Great and Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for BBQ'ing easy to use and keeps everything clean. I do at least 2 bbq's a week and i love using this.
customer_reviews.author: Saguit Hazan

customer_reviews.title: A Must for any BBQ Chef!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy cooking with these copper mats, it less of a clean and all my meats still get the grill marks. Just make sure your food does not have a lot of fat, others wise, be careful when removing the mats, since it will create a flare up if the flame is still on.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Solis

customer_reviews.title: No more messed up grill grates !
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Love these grilling mats. Hope they last cause it makes barbecuing super easy. Great grill flavor and no messed up grill grates.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: BBQ is always fun.. just buy it and you feel the ...
customer_reviews.text: BBQ is always fun.. just buy it and you feel the difference .. great product.. Will buy more of it for my friends and family..
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: We love these grill mats. They are great for grilling vegetables or fish on the barbecue.
customer_reviews.author: mary zieman

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was skeptical at first but last week asked for the "copper mat thingy" to grill salmon. Cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Very happy cooking outside again.
customer_reviews.text: I used to burn everything grilling now this works perfect. Grill marks and no losing all the marinade, or barbecue.
customer_reviews.author: James J Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: It did a great job. The hot coals did not hurt the ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this product over an open fire, on top of the grill. It did a great job. The hot coals did not hurt the pad. The chicken cooked great and both sides cleaned so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A great way to save calories and fat. The product is made from high quality materials so I can use it again and again = strong and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: Great product keeps my oven clean
customer_reviews.text: For now using this product in the oven. Great product keeps my oven clean! Once winter is over we will definitely use it on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: mor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product because I can use it for my oven and for my grill. They are strong and dishwasher safe. The food doesn't stick and it's very easy to clean. Highly recommended, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Hani

customer_reviews.title: How long it last.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure at this time only used it a couple times will let you know. To use in our grill and stove.
customer_reviews.author: Irving Van Lew

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully - did 40 burgers over Fourth of July and it was WONDERFUL! Clean up was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalCity

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. But second time was last night for burgers
customer_reviews.text: Although I have only used the mats twice. First time was for pizza on the grill. Worked great. But second time was last night for burgers. Sadly I have to say I’m disappointed. The edge of the mat burnt. And I did have grill set to a lower tempature. So this is why I’m giving it 2stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Everything slides right off
customer_reviews.text: Everything just slides right off of it! Instead of aluminum foil to back cookies or biscuits I use this then straight into the sink with a drop of soap and it’s clean as when I started! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dauzat

customer_reviews.title: Great for veggies
customer_reviews.text: They work amazingly well! We've used them on multiple occasions. Great for veggies, too!
customer_reviews.author: CBee

customer_reviews.title: Good product, recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures here. Doesn't do justice to the product. Product is made from a fine material, and good quality. I got it today and already used on my grill, I made a salmon and I'm very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: T.Lee

customer_reviews.title: This product works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The thing I like most about these mats is it keeps your grill clean. The thing I like least is if you cook with high heat the mat is harder to clean. I also think the container you keep the mats in is great! One sheet is the perfect size for my table top grill.
customer_reviews.author: Doug  A  Childers

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever J used his product, was never comfortable, felt that a fire soon would come. Food did not cook completely. I am so sorry did not complain sooner so that i could get refund, Do Not Order this Product!
customer_reviews.author: books

customer_reviews.title: Great new grilling utensil
customer_reviews.text: The copper grill mat is my new favorite grilling utensil. It's terrific for veggies, fish, turkey burgers, and just about anything that used to stick to the grill or fall through the grate. And the easy clean up is another plus. Just wait until it cools off first :).
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: These are great on the barb. They clean up nice. For gas barbs the grease stays on the mats. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Combs

customer_reviews.title: Heat for better clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Makes grill much easier. Used it several times. Heat for better clean up. But need to clean up more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Li

customer_reviews.title: Like that they are reusable
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my brother-in-law and he was excited. Like that they are reusable. Will purchase some for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats are nice. I used one to do steaks indoors on my ancient stainless steel grill and it performed great. It also reduces cleanup dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: Crittermum

customer_reviews.title: Great grill accessory
customer_reviews.text: Great for times when you want to keep the juices in play rather than have them all go down the drain. Also makes grill cleanup very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Vermeulen

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Order came really quick was actually suprised to see it in my mail when it showed up. Used one tonight for potato wedges and country style ribs worked awesomely not even the bbq sauce stuck. Even when getting the pan out to flip food during cooking the mat was touchable where the pan burnt my finger when i accidentally touched it
customer_reviews.author: revpsycho

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: love this product, the sauce is preserved while grilling and there are no flare-ups, great product
customer_reviews.author: Coach Omer

customer_reviews.title: customer service is excellent and their copper mates are awesome
customer_reviews.text: First, customer service is excellent and their copper mates are awesome, product delivers as discribed. Will keep my barbecue clean.
customer_reviews.author: Randy K

customer_reviews.title: These mats are wonderful I have used them four times and saved so ...
customer_reviews.text: These mats are wonderful I have used them four times and saved so much cleaning time. I would recommend these to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Anna Compagnone

customer_reviews.title: Works Great & Keeps Grill Looking New
customer_reviews.text: These mats work amazingly well and have kept our grill looking new. They are relatively easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jenkins

product_meta.title: MiTBA Copper Grill Mats Best Baking & Grilling Accessories Ever! These Non-Stick & Reusable Magic Gadgets Will Get You Flawless Meat and a Clean Barbecue! Set of 3 XL Mats in a Never-Lose-It Box!
feature_bullets: GET EXCITED, GRILLING BECOMES MUCH SMOOTHER! → These copper mats are the greatest invention for grilling since the barbecue itself! From now on, you get all the benefits of the barbecue without the hassle: they prevent the meat from falling through the grates, they stop the grease from causing flare-ups, they are non-stick and they distribute the heat evenly. All of these while leaving grill marks, preserving your sauces and spices and making sure that your grill will look brand new forever!

YOU DESERVE THE BEST QUALITY, AND THIS IS WHAT YOU GET → These exceptional mats have heat resistance for up to 500°F. We also created them with the perfect thickness of 0.2mm: thick enough to make them durable and heavy duty, thin enough to leave grill marks and keep the delicious barbecue taste. Oh, and they are also dishwasher safe!

USE THEM AGAIN AND AGAIN → From now on you can stop buying aluminum foil and parchment paper, because these miracle grill mats keep their high performance each and every time you use them. Plus, we packed them in a solid and beautiful never-lose-it box, so it will be convenient for you to store them.

SAVE MONEY AND SPACE WITH THIS MULTIPURPOSE PRODUCT! → Why buy baking sheets and bbq grill mats separately when you can have them both in one product? Use your new mats on any kind of barbecue (charcoal, gas, electric, etc.) and any kind of oven (conventional, multi-function, toaster, etc.). You can grill and bake anything! Feel like eating meat, veggies, shrimps, fish, bacon, pizza, pancakes, eggs, cake? Get them on the mat!

FEEL SECURE WITH YOUR PURCHASE! → When you order today, you’re protected by our 60 day, no-questions-asked, money back guarantee and our fabulous customer service. We are a family-run business and we give 100% to each one of our unique customers. Press Add to Cart with confidence!
